Place AutoHotKey Autocompletion file in:

"C:\Program Files\Notepad++\autoCompletion"


Import Syntaxhighlighting file into Notepad


### Notepad++ settings ###

- change Design to Twilight
- change background color to (51, 51, 51) with temp: 160, s√§tt: 0 and hell 48
- change font to Segoe UI with Size 12
- make font default and make size default 
- make default Vordergrundfarbe and default Hintergrundfarbe
